member.name: T:Sample.Api.Application.Commands.IdentifierCommandHandler`2
member.summary: Provides a base implementation for handling duplicate request and ensuring idempotent updates, in the cases where a requestid sent by client is used to detect duplicate requests.
member.typeparam: Type of the command handler that performs the operation if request is not duplicated
Return value of the inner command handler

member.name: M:Sample.Api.Application.Commands.IdentifierCommandHandler`2.CreateResultForDuplicateRequest
member.summary: Creates the result value to return if a previous request was found

member.name: M:Ordering.API.Application.IntegrationEvents.EventHandling.GracePeriodConfirmedIntegrationEventHandler.Handle(Ordering.API.Application.IntegrationEvents.Events.GracePeriodConfirmedIntegrationEvent)
member.summary: Event handler which confirms that the grace period has been completed and order will not initially be cancelled. Therefore, the order process continues for validation.
